打开《萌龙大乱斗》，准备迎接开学季的到来吧！加入成千上万的驯龙师们的行列，参加返校季赛事，获取梦幻新萌龙！
• 学业繁重也不要忘记照顾你的萌龙！每天进行游戏，在最新的日程赛事中赢取超酷奖励。收集全套道具换取绝赞新萌龙。
• 老玩家们，一起庆祝吧！在萌龙身上投入最多心血的驯龙师将会获得一份特殊的奖励。
• 谁说科学就一定是枯燥的？来我们即将推出的单人赛事中找到精彩乐趣吧！
• 我们找到了一些讨厌的游戏bug，然后我们把bug都喂给萌龙了。

This time we're bringing you some much-requested fixes as well as introducing some cool new features to add even more depth to your adventures in Dragolandia.
- Chronos is now easier to find! Send ANY three dragons to explore ruins and collect those precious Chronosian Seals for you. Already awakened him? Keep collecting Seals to summon his little minions.
- No need for a poker face. Check out our new Dragon Card Packs and we guarantee you'll be smiling from ear to ear!
- Need a boost? You can now brew magic potions for your Enchanted League dragons to make sure you have an edge over your rivals.
- By popular demand, Clan MVPs can now manage clan dragons in the absence of their clan leader.

With more than just fancy eggs, the Easter Bunny has a lot in store for you this time!
- Relive your childhood memories on an exciting new island chock-full of toys! Our favorite is the mini choo-choo train.
- Clans are now easier to manage, with the introduction of an officer system. Promote clan members to officers, with multiple ranks to choose from.
- Send mystery gift boxes to your friends, which include the dragon pieces for the new Enchantress Dragon!

An exciting new event type and a more fluid gameplay experience await you in Update 19!

- Coming soon to Dragon Mania Legends, the Happy Dragon Event! Fulfill your dragon’s wildest dreams with a special contraption -- called Dragon’s Delight -- to earn cool rewards.
- Feast your eyes on the redesigned Codex, which is now almost as majestic as the dragons it chronicles.
- Check out the revamped collections page to find out which dragons to pursue next! Completing a collection awards you with exciting prizes.
- To aid you on your journey to become the next great Dragon Lord, we’ve developed the Level-Up Chart, which will help you prioritize your goals.
- There are also many other subtle gameplay and user-experience improvements.

Update 20 of Dragon Mania Legends continues the gameplay improvements from our last update and brings exciting new features.
- Introducing Clan Wars! Battle your rivals and storm their Fortress in epic Clan Sieges!

- Additional fixes for a more fluid gameplay experience.

Gather ‘round your Spruce Dragon and check out what’s new in this year’s Winter Update:

A new business is making waves in Dragolandia!
- The Whale-Mart is open for business! It offers all kinds of rare goodies for the savvy haggler, allowing them to clear their inventory of items they’ve amassed during their adventures.

Exciting events and many improvements await you in our latest update!
- Explore a new campaign island and a fresh story chapter to win exclusive new dragons!
- New habitat upgrade levels now let you store up to six dragons.
- The maximum number of farms has been increased, because we like our dragons well fed.
- The level limit for dragons has been increased to meet new challenges.
- New enchantment levels have been added to make your dragons even more powerful.
- Ascend dragons to receive enchantment materials.
- New Elite League added to the Arena, and new milestone rewards added to every league!

Get ready to investigate the mysterious ruins floating above Dragolandia!
- Embark on a heart-pounding adventure spanning multiple epic locations as you explore the strange realm of the Northern Divines on a quest to reach Odin’s Lair!
- Meet never-before-seen dragons along the way, such as the trickster Loki Dragon, the ferocious Fenrir Dragon and, of course, the Odin Dragon himself!

Get ready to roll the dice in the biggest update of the year!
• A new mega event on the horizon! Introducing the board-game-inspired Dragon Dice—collect keys to magical chests that contain valuable prizes.
• Ancient Dragons! Meet the rarest and most powerful dragons as Ned embarks on a journey that takes him all the way back to the birth of Dragolandia where the members of the Ancient element rule!
• Complete the Constellations of Autumn collection and get a hold of the cosmic Twilight Dragon!

Don't let the end of summer get you down, because we're back with three exciting events!
• A new Castle Event with beautiful China-themed maps and brand-new Green Lion and Red Lion Dragons to collect
• Check out the Dragon's Delight event to acquire goodies for your dragons and cool rewards for yourself
• Don't be afraid of the spooky Halloween event — the Rose-Wing Dragon will reward the courageous!
• Plenty of new rewards in the Arena, Clan Events, daily activities and Card Packs

Welcome to an exciting new update for Dragon Mania Legends!
- Conquer a new island with plenty of space for your habitats!
- Defeat other Clans in our latest event type — the Emerald Wars!
- Explore the completely revamped Dungeon feature!

The realm of sands calls once more…
- Apep, Isis and Seth reborn in Chrono Divine form, plus loads more dragons – some cute, some vicious, all awesome
- Through ancient knowledge and persistent tinkering, Hogwin's created the Eternal Fruit Tree! Harvest a constant flow of dragon fruit and store up to two Boss Dragons! But make sure they don’t harvest them in your stead!
- Use powerful Relics to boost your island's economy in various ways and enhance the odds of breeding more powerful dragons!

The original Divine Dragons are back!
- Zeus and the Greek Divines are taken on a futuristic adventure to continue the story of the game’s most powerful dragons
- Further Chat system enhancements
